programme.title: Casino Jack

programme.title: Fallen

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

programme.title: Man on fire

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The story of the awakening of painter, Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

programme.title: Serena
programme.desc: North Carolina mountains at the end of the 1920s George and Serena Pemberton, love-struck newly-weds, begin to build a timber empire. Serena soon proves herself to be equal to any man: overseeing loggers, hunting rattle-snakes, even saving a mans life in the wilderness. With power and influence now in their hands, the Pembertons refuse to let anyone stand in the way of their inflated love and ambitions. However, once Serena discovers Georges hidden past and faces an unchangeable fate of her.

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Billy "The Great" Hope, the reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, has an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter, and a lavish lifestyle. However, when tragedy strikes, Billy hits rock bottom, losing his family, his house and his manager. He soon finds an unlikely savior in Tick Willis, a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, Hope fights to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most.

programme.title: Texas Killing Fields
programme.desc: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: After spending eight months in a mental institution, a former teacher moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: When the curator of the Louvre is found murdered in the famed museum's hallowed halls, Harvard professor, Robert Langdon and cryptographer, Sophie Neve must untangle a deadly web of deceit involving the works of Leonardo da Vinci.

programme.title: In the Name of the King: The Last Mission
programme.desc: Hazen Kaine, an American contract killer living in Sofia, Bulgaria, gets more than he bargains for when he enters into a contract with the mob. One last job before he gets out and starts a new life for himself. The targets: the three children of royal billionaire Andon Dupont. Seems simple enough, or so he thought. Hazen apprehends the children, and before he can blink an eye, a simple necklace worn by one of the children sends his life spiraling back to medieval times. Now completely out of his.

programme.title: Braven
programme.desc: A logger defends his family from a group of dangerous drug runners.

programme.title: Act of Valor
programme.desc: When a covert mission to rescue a kidnapped CIA operative uncovers a chilling plot, an elite, highly trained U.S. SEAL team speeds to hotspots around the globe, racing against the clock to stop a deadly terrorist attack.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: From the Egyptian desert to deep below the polar ice caps, the elite G.I. JOE team uses the latest in next-generation spy and military equipment to fight the corrupt arms dealer Destro and the growing threat of the mysterious Cobra organization to prevent them from plunging the world into chaos.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider at Oscorp, nerdy but endearing high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers to become the superhero known as Spider-Man.

programme.title: FURIOSA: A MAD MAX SAGA
programme.desc: As the world fell, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the hands of a great Biker Horde led by the Warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the Wasteland they come across the Citadel presided over by The Immortan Joe. While the two Tyrants war for dominance, Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: In the post-apocalyptic future, reigning tyrannical supercomputers teleport a cyborg assassin known as the "Terminator" back to 1984 to kill Sarah Connor, whose unborn son is destined to lead insurgen.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: With computer genius Luther Stickell at his side and a beautiful thief on his mind, agent Ethan Hunt races across Australia and Spain to stop a former IMF agent from unleashing a genetically engineered biological weapon called Chimera. This mission, should Hunt choose to accept it, plunges him into the center of an international crisis of terrifying magnitude.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces, following the conclusion of "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," Autobots and Decepticons have all but vanished from the face of the planet. However, a group of powerful, ingenious businessman and scientists attempt to learn from past Transformer incursions and push the boundaries of technology beyond what they can control - all while an ancient, powerful Transformer menace sets Earth in his cross-hairs.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: One year after outwitting the FBI and winning the publics adulation with their mind-bending spectacles, the Four Horsemen resurface only to find themselves face to face with a new enemy who enlists them to pull off their most dangerous heist yet.

programme.title: Superfast!
programme.desc: Undercover cop Lucas White joins Vin Serento's gang of illegal street racers. They are fast and they are furious and they plan to double cross Los Angeles kingpin Juan Carlos de la Sol, who hides his cash in a downtown Taco Bell.

programme.title: Incoming

programme.title: Stars!

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: An ex- CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Set Up
programme.desc: A group of friends plan out a detailed heist that turns deadly when one betrays the other by taking off with the goods. Taking matters into his own hands, Sonny seeks out his revenge teaming up with the most dangerous mob boss in town to get back what is rightfully his. When he finally comes face to face with his longtime friend he will be forced to make a life changing choice.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
